ingredients: Oats, Water/Milk, Honey, Banana
instructions: 1. Boil water/milk. 2. Add oats. 3. Cook for 5 min. 4. Add honey & banana.

ingredients: Chicken breast, Lettuce, Tomato, Olive oil, Lemon
instructions: 1. Grill chicken. 2. Chop veggies. 3. Mix with olive oil & lemon juice.

ingredients: Bread, Avocado, Salt, Pepper
instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado. 3. Spread on toast. 4. Add salt & pepper.

ingredients: Greek yogurt, Granola, Berries, Honey
instructions: 1. Layer yogurt, granola, and berries. 2. Drizzle with honey.

ingredients: Quinoa, Chicken, Spinach, Feta, Olive oil
instructions: 1. Cook quinoa. 2. Grill chicken. 3. Mix with spinach, feta, and olive oil.

ingredients: Salmon, Lemon, Garlic, Olive oil, Herbs
instructions: 1. Marinate salmon. 2. Bake at 375°F for 15-20 min.

ingredients: Banana, Almond milk, Peanut butter, Honey
instructions: 1. Blend banana, almond milk, peanut butter, and honey.

ingredients: Broccoli, Carrots, Bell peppers, Soy sauce, Tofu
instructions: 1. Sauté veggies. 2. Add tofu and soy sauce. 3. Stir-fry for 5 min.

ingredients: Chia seeds, Almond milk, Honey, Berries
instructions: 1. Mix chia seeds with almond milk and honey. 2. Refrigerate overnight. 3. Add berries before serving.

ingredients: Egg whites, Spinach, Tomatoes, Cheese
instructions: 1. Beat egg whites. 2. Cook with spinach and tomatoes. 3. Add cheese.

ingredients: Lentils, Carrots, Celery, Onion, Garlic
instructions: 1. Sauté onion & garlic. 2. Add lentils, carrots, and celery. 3. Simmer until soft.

ingredients: Zucchini, Olive oil, Garlic, Parmesan cheese
instructions: 1. Spiralize zucchini. 2. Sauté with garlic. 3. Top with parmesan cheese.

ingredients: Tofu, Soy sauce, Sesame oil, Garlic
instructions: 1. Marinate tofu in soy sauce & garlic. 2. Grill until golden brown.

ingredients: Bell peppers, Brown rice, Ground turkey, Tomato sauce
instructions: 1. Cook rice & turkey. 2. Stuff into bell peppers. 3. Bake at 375°F for 20 min.

ingredients: Chickpeas, Olive oil, Garlic, Carrot sticks, Cucumber
instructions: 1. Blend chickpeas, garlic, and olive oil. 2. Serve with sliced veggies.

ingredients: Sweet potato, Olive oil, Cinnamon
instructions: 1. Bake sweet potato at 375°F for 40 min. 2. Sprinkle with cinnamon.

ingredients: Protein powder, Almond milk, Banana, Peanut butter
instructions: 1. Blend all ingredients until smooth.

ingredients: Whole wheat wrap, Spinach, Feta, Egg
instructions: 1. Scramble eggs. 2. Add spinach & feta. 3. Wrap in whole wheat tortilla.

ingredients: Chia seeds, Coconut milk, Mango
instructions: 1. Mix chia seeds with coconut milk. 2. Refrigerate overnight. 3. Top with mango.

ingredients: Salmon, Asparagus, Olive oil, Garlic
instructions: 1. Roast salmon & asparagus with olive oil and garlic.
